2. Data: you can also include your samples in the table, these are considered "physical data". 
3. Ethics: you mention mouse models in you data table, please also list these approval number(s) from the animal ethics committee. 
7. Sharing: Since you work with patient data it may be better to use a European EBI repository instead of the US based NCBI, for repository selection see www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/. For data for which there is no specific repository you can use KU Leuven RDR: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
